title: Galio Rework
body: I find the Galio rework weird. he punches a lot and talks about punching but he is a mage and scales with ap. he is a/the colossus but casts spells and isn't that big compared to many champs but talks about being huge. and looking at him i just think flying punchy thing. and that's what his kit kind of is. except he is a mage. I get that he has to be because of old Galio. but couldn't you have done something different and saved this for later, like for an ad rework or a new champ. i just see him and think of a Jayce and Vi hybrid.

replies.body: Coulda been the aatrox rework. It would sound about right with small edits. Q aatrox flaps his wings and shred them with magic awesomeness. E, aatrox lunges forwards, thrusting his blade into them towards the sky, ult... he has wings for a reason...
